mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM PURCHASE_MANAGEMENT P
INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE H ON P.EMPLOYEE_ID = H.EMPLOYEE_ID
INNER JOIN CLIENT_LIST C ON P.CLIENT_NO = C.CLIENT_NO
INNER JOIN MATERIAL_PRODUCT M ON P.MATERIAL_PRODUCT_NO = M.MATERIAL_PRODUCT_NO
ORDER BY PURCHASE_NO DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASE_MANAGEMENT (PURCHASE_DATE, CLIENT_NO, EMPLOYEE_ID, FACTORY_STORAGE_NO,MOD_MENU,REG_ID,REG_DATE,REG_MENU,MOD_ID,MOD_DATE) VALUES (#{purchaseDate}, #{clientNo}, #{employeeId}, #{factoryStorageNo}, #{modMenu},#{regId},NOW(),#{regMenu},#{modId},NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CLIENT_LIST WHERE CLIENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
SELECT * FROM FACTORY_STORAGE WHERE FACTORY_STORAGE_NO = (SELECT CODE FROM CODE WHERE CODE_NAME = #{codeName})

SELECT *, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(F.FACTORY_STORAGE_CD,3),F.FACTORY_STORAGE_CD) AS FACTORY_NM FROM PURCHASE_MANAGEMENT P
INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE H ON P.EMPLOYEE_ID = H.EMPLOYEE_ID
INNER JOIN CLIENT_LIST C ON P.CLIENT_NO = C.CLIENT_NO
INNER JOIN FACTORY_STORAGE F ON P.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO = F.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO
WHERE P.PURCHASE_NO=#{purchaseNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE PURCHASE_MANAGEMENT P INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE H ON P.EMPLOYEE_ID = H.EMPLOYEE_ID INNER JOIN CLIENT_LIST C ON P.CLIENT_NO = C.CLIENT_NO INNER JOIN FACTORY_STORAGE F ON P.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO = F.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO SET P.PURCHASE_DATE=#{purchaseDate}, C.CLIENT_NAME=#{clientVO.clientName} , H.NAME=#{employeeVO.name} , P.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO=#{factoryStorageNo},P.MOD_DATE=NOW() WHERE P.PURCHASE_NO=#{purchaseNo}
mapper.delete:
DELETE PURCHASE_MANAGEMENT P INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE H ON P.EMPLOYEE_ID = H.EMPLOYEE_ID INNER JOIN CLIENT_LIST C ON P.CLIENT_NO = C.CLIENT_NO
WHERE P.PURCHASE_NO=#{purchaseNo}
